title: Jungle of the Fallen Gods
intro: The air shifts the moment you enter. Dense vines twist overhead, blocking out the sun. A distant, rhythmic drumbeat echoes through the Jungle of the Fallen Gods—slow… then stopping mid-beat. The trees seem to breathe. Something watches you from the dark. Welcome, traveler. Your story begins now.

edge_of_jungle.desc: You stand at the tangled edge of a vast jungle. Mist curls across the ground. A narrow, winding path disappears between ancient roots.

damp_clearing.desc: A damp clearing, thick with fern and mushrooms. You see a half-buried stone marker etched with spirals.

river_bank.desc: A slow, muddy river, vines trailing into the water. The drumbeat seems stronger near the water.

ancient_ruin.desc: Moss-covered ruins rise from the ground. Carved idols watch from shadowed niches.

watcher_idol.desc: A stone idol with hollow eyes. Whispers seem to come from it at night.

mini_arc_goal: Retrieve the glowing relic fragment from the ruins and escape the jungle.
